summary: Don McKay, a high school janitor who leaves his hometown after a tragedy, returns 25 years later to rekindle a romance with his old flame, who is dying, but this homecoming brings McKay more than he bargained for.
cast: Thomas Haden Church|Rachel Harker|Stephen Benson|M. Emmet Walsh|Melissa Leo|Elisabeth Shue|Amanda George|James Rebhorn|Bates Wilder|Keith David|Melissa Rosal|Meagan Hawkes|Dossy Peabody|Robert Wahlberg|Pruitt Taylor Vince|Ted Arcidi|Lewis D. Wheeler|Charlie Peabody|Harley Harrison|Lonnie Farmer|Jack Burke|Mark Hemphill|Darryl Wooten
keywords: character name as title|two word title|school janitor|male female relationship|dead body wrapped in carpet
title: Don McKay
